Overview

Developers

PassiveTracerFlows is currently being developed by Gregory L. Wagner and Navid C. Constantinou.

Cite

The code is citable via zenodo. Please cite as:

Gregory L. Wagner & Navid C. Constantinou. (2018). FourierFlows/FourierFlows.jl. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1161724
